inra.ijpb.binary.geodesic

Class GeodesicDistanceTransformShort5x5

  • java.lang.Object
    • inra.ijpb.binary.geodesic.GeodesicDistanceTransformShort5x5
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeodesicDistanceTransform

    public class GeodesicDistanceTransformShort5x5
extends java.lang.Object
implements GeodesicDistanceTransform
    Computation of Chamfer geodesic distances using short integer array for storing result, and 5-by-5 chamfer masks. The maximum propagated distance is limited to Short.MAX_VALUE. All computations are performed using integers, results are stored as shorts.
    Author:
    David Legland

      • geodesicDistanceMap

        public ij.process.ShortProcessor geodesicDistanceMap(ij.process.ImageProcessor marker,
                                            ij.process.ImageProcessor mask)
        Computes the geodesic distance function for each pixel in mask, using the given mask. Mask and marker should be ImageProcessor the same size and containing integer values. The function returns a new ShortProcessor the same size as the input, with values greater or equal to zero.
        Specified by:
        geodesicDistanceMap in interface GeodesicDistanceTransform
        Parameters:
        marker - the binary image of marker
        mask - the binary image of mask
        Returns:
        the geodesic distance map in a new ImageProcessor
